result.title: Report on the influence of chemical factors on SODIS inactivation
result.description: Deliverable in the form of a report on chemical enhancement of SODIS involving: 1. Naturally occurring groundwater constituents (photoactive NOM and Iron oxides) selected in Task 4.2, in order to generate photosensitized reactive oxygen species (ROS) to enhance bacterial solar disinfection. (EPFL, BU, URJC, CIEMAT-PSA, USC). 2. The influence of oxygen and H2O2 on SODIS. (CIEMAT-PSA, USC, EPFL). This will be investigated in its contribution of inactivating of microbial pathogens in water naturally containing Fe forms, under simulated and natural solar light. Finally, the use of homogenous catalysis has to be considered, given its significant efficiency even in low intensity light. TRL 2 This is an output of Tasks 4.2.1, 4.2.2, 4.3.1

result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: The DMP will describe the data management life cycle for the data to be collected, processed and/or generated and contain information on: 1) the handling of research data during and after the end of the project; 2) what data will be collected, processed and/or generated; 3) which methodology and standards will be applied, 4) whether data will be shared/made open access and 5) how data will be curated and preserved (including after the end of the project).
